translation.from: No, thanks. (You can always do this later)
translation.to: No, thanks. (You can always do this later)
新規アカウントを登録
既成アカウントにログイン

translation.from: Yes, I am an existing Trillian Pro customer
translation.to: はい、既成Trillian Proアカウント持ちです

translation.from: Yes, include these connections in my public AstraContact.
translation.to: Yes, include these connections in my public AstraContact.

translation.from: A Trillian update is now available. Click here for more information.
translation.to: ただ今Trillianのアップデートを配布中です。詳細はここにクリック。

translation.from: A confirmation code was sent to your email to verify this account.
translation.to: A confirmation code was sent to your email to verify this account.

translation.from: A new version of Trillian is now available for download. This is an optional update.
translation.to: A new version of Trillian is now available for download. This is an optional update.

translation.from: A new version of Trillian is now available. This is a required update; if you do not wish to update now, the update will be installed the next time you sign in.
translation.to: A new version of Trillian is now available. This is a required update; if you do not wish to update now, the update will be installed the next time you sign in.

translation.from: A token is required to create an account at this time.
translation.to: A token is required to create an account at this time.

translation.from: All downloads complete, press next to install.
translation.to: All downloads complete, press next to install.

translation.from: Amount of time to save for Instant Playback:
translation.to: Amount of time to save for Instant Playback:

translation.to: An AstraContact allows you to expose your accounts and statuses to others. Do you want to include the connections you set up today in your AstraContact?

translation.to: An email address is used to send information regarding your account. We do not share this email address.

translation.to: An old version of Trillian was found on this computer. Do you want to copy its contacts and settings over to this new Trillian Astra Account?

translation.to: Are you sure you wish to exit the new account wizard? Your account is not fully set up.

translation.to: Are you sure you wish to remove %account%?

translation.to: No skin extras found for this current skin

translation.to: No, do not move my settings Trillian will be unable to import settings from the chosen profile

translation.to: Override my contacts on the server with my local copy

translation.from: Passwords are case-sensitive; you may use any combination of letters, numbers, and punctuation that you wish. Passwords can be from 6 to 32 characters in length.
translation.to: Passwords are case-sensitive; you may use any combination of letters, numbers, and punctuation that you wish. Passwords can be from 6 to 32 characters in length.

translation.from: Please check your email for a confirmation code.
translation.to: Please check your email for a confirmation code.

translation.from: Please confirm your Trillian Astra account with your email address. Also, please provide us with a security question and answer should you lose your password.
translation.to: Please confirm your Trillian Astra account with your email address. Also, please provide us with a security question and answer should you lose your password.

translation.from: Please correct the error below to continue.
translation.to: Please correct the error below to continue.

translation.from: Please correct the errors below to continue.
translation.to: Please correct the errors below to continue.

translation.from: Please select an icon to use.
translation.to: Please select an icon to use.

translation.from: Please set up your proxy configuration below.
translation.to: Please set up your proxy configuration below.

translation.from: Please specify a name to use.
translation.to: Please specify a name to use.

translation.from: Please tell us where you heard about Trillian.
translation.to: Please tell us where you heard about Trillian.

translation.from: Please wait while we communicate with the server.
translation.to: Please wait while we communicate with the server.

translation.from: Registering will allow you to quickly access all your IM accounts at once.
translation.to: Registering will allow you to quickly access all your IM accounts at once.

translation.from: Select a display name that will help your contacts easily identify you on their list! You may enter any combination of nickname, first name, and last name that you choose.
translation.to: Select a display name that will help your contacts easily identify you on their list! You may enter any combination of nickname, first name, and last name that you choose.

translation.from: Select a widget below to add to the Contact List
translation.to: Select a widget below to add to the Contact List

translation.from: Select a widget below to add to your Astra Profile
translation.to: Select a widget below to add to your Astra Profile

translation.from: Select a widget below to add to your Trillian Mini
translation.to: Select a widget below to add to your Trillian Mini

translation.from: Setup your public profile. This information will be available both on the web and to people who chat with you on the Trillian Astra network. You may leave any field here blank.
translation.to: Setup your public profile. This information will be available both on the web and to people who chat with you on the Trillian Astra network. You may leave any field here blank.
ステータスメッセージ

translation.from: Thank you for being a previous Trillian Pro customer. Please provide your Trillian Pro member email and password that was given to you when you purchased.
translation.to: Thank you for being a previous Trillian Pro customer. Please provide your Trillian Pro member email and password that was given to you when you purchased.

translation.from: The Astra username you picked is already taken.
translation.to: The Astra username you picked is already taken.

translation.from: The Welcome Wizard is going to guide you through the basic configuration of Trillian Astra in %num% simple stages.
translation.to: The Welcome Wizard is going to guide you through the basic configuration of Trillian Astra in %num% simple stages.

translation.from: The contact list is where all your connections and contacts reside. The next few steps will guide you through the configuration of your connections one by one.
translation.to: The contact list is where all your connections and contacts reside. The next few steps will guide you through the configuration of your connections one by one.

translation.from: The email address did not seem valid. Please try again.
translation.to: The email address did not seem valid. Please try again.

translation.from: The email address you provided is already linked to another Astra account. Please type again.
translation.to: The email address you provided is already linked to another Astra account. Please type again.

translation.from: The email you entered does not seem to be valid. Please try again.
translation.to: The email you entered does not seem to be valid. Please try again.

translation.from: The image verification failed, please try again.
translation.to: The image verification failed, please try again.

translation.from: The old password was not entered in correctly. Please try again.
translation.to: The old password was not entered in correctly. Please try again.

translation.from: The proxy server is currently off within Internet Explorer.
translation.to: The proxy server is currently off within Internet Explorer.

translation.from: The token you provided did not seem valid.
translation.to: The token you provided did not seem valid.

translation.from: The two email addresses you typed do not match. Please type again.
translation.to: The two email addresses you typed do not match. Please type again.

translation.from: The two emails you typed do not match.
translation.to: The two emails you typed do not match.

translation.from: The two passwords you typed do not match.
translation.to: The two passwords you typed do not match.

translation.from: There was a server error while changing your email address. Please try again at a later date.
translation.to: There was a server error while changing your email address. Please try again at a later date.

translation.from: There was a server error while changing your password. Please try again at a later date.
translation.to: There was a server error while changing your password. Please try again at a later date.

translation.from: There was a server error while sending the confirmation code. Please try again.
translation.to: There was a server error while sending the confirmation code. Please try again.

translation.from: There was a server error while validating your member information. Please try again at a later date.
translation.to: There was a server error while validating your member information. Please try again at a later date.

translation.from: This build of Trillian is outdated.
translation.to: This build of Trillian is outdated.

translation.from: This does not appear to be a valid confirmation code. Please type again.
translation.to: This does not appear to be a valid confirmation code. Please type again.
これはサンプルメッセージです。

translation.from: This is the Chat screen your friends will see.
translation.to: This is the Chat screen your friends will see.

translation.from: This is the Profile screen your friends will see.
translation.to: This is the Profile screen your friends will see.

translation.from: To further complete your profile, use the Profile Editor.
translation.to: To further complete your profile, use the Profile Editor.

translation.from: To further configure your connections, use the Identities & Connections Manager.
translation.to: To further configure your connections, use the Identities & Connections Manager.

translation.from: To learn more about how to use Trillian, click the icon on the top of the Contact List and choose "Help". Enjoy and thanks for choosing Trillian!
translation.to: To learn more about how to use Trillian, click the icon on the top of the Contact List and choose "Help". Enjoy and thanks for choosing Trillian!

translation.from: To learn more about how to use Trillian, use the "?" button at the top-right corner of the Contact List. Enjoy and thanks for choosing Trillian!
translation.to: To learn more about how to use Trillian, use the "?" button at the top-right corner of the Contact List. Enjoy and thanks for choosing Trillian!

translation.from: To learn more about how to use Trillian, use the "Help" menu at the top of the Contact List. Enjoy and thanks for choosing Trillian!
translation.to: To learn more about how to use Trillian, use the "Help" menu at the top of the Contact List. Enjoy and thanks for choosing Trillian!

translation.from: Trillian Astra can be configured in many ways. Here are three basic sets of settings that may suit your needs. You can fine-tune them in Trillian Preferences later.
translation.to: Trillian Astra can be configured in many ways. Here are three basic sets of settings that may suit your needs. You can fine-tune them in Trillian Preferences later.

translation.from: Trillian Astra features many new IM and Web services for you to connect to. Do you want to connect to any other services below?
translation.to: Trillian Astra features many new IM and Web services for you to connect to. Do you want to connect to any other services below?

translation.from: Trillian detects that you may be on a new computer.
translation.to: Trillian detects that you may be on a new computer.

translation.from: Trillian has been successfully updated. Click here to view the list of changes in this version.
translation.to: Trillian has been successfully updated. Click here to view the list of changes in this version.

translation.from: Trillian is currently in offline mode and not connected to the Trillian Astra network. Any changes to your connections will not be saved to the server.
translation.to: Trillian is currently in offline mode and not connected to the Trillian Astra network. Any changes to your connections will not be saved to the server.

translation.from: Trillian is currently in offline mode and not connected to the Trillian Astra network. Any changes to your contact list will not be saved to the server.
translation.to: Trillian is currently in offline mode and not connected to the Trillian Astra network. Any changes to your contact list will not be saved to the server.

translation.to: Trillian: Close all visible systray alerts

translation.to: Type the name for the new Identity here

translation.to: Type the name for the new group here

translation.to: What is your library card number?

translation.to: What is your primary frequent flyer number?

translation.to: Where did you hear about us?

translation.to: Which graphic would you like used to represent you?

translation.from: Would you like to import your settings from a previous installation?
translation.to: Would you like to import your settings from a previous installation?

translation.from: Yes, safely move my files and settings (Recommended)
translation.to: Yes, safely move my files and settings (Recommended)

translation.from: You are not connected to Trillian Astra.
translation.to: You are not connected to Trillian Astra.

translation.from: You have already set up an account. Would you like to go back to generate another account?
translation.to: You have already set up an account. Would you like to go back to generate another account?

translation.from: You have finished setting up your AstraProfile. Even more items can be set in the Profile Editor.
translation.to: You have finished setting up your AstraProfile. Even more items can be set in the Profile Editor.

translation.from: You have successfully changed your email.
translation.to: You have successfully changed your email.

translation.from: You have successfully changed your password.
translation.to: You have successfully changed your password.

translation.from: You have successfully registered an Astra Account. Please continue with the wizard to set this account up.
translation.to: You have successfully registered an Astra Account. Please continue with the wizard to set this account up.

translation.from: You have successfully updated your information.
translation.to: You have successfully updated your information.

translation.from: You have successfully updated your membership information.
translation.to: You have successfully updated your membership information.

translation.from: You may select a graphic from below or even load and crop a custom photo from your PC.
translation.to: You may select a graphic from below or even load and crop a custom photo from your PC.

translation.from: You must accept the agreement to create an account.
translation.to: You must accept the agreement to create an account.

translation.from: You must be at least 13 years old to use Trillian Astra.
translation.to: You must be at least 13 years old to use Trillian Astra.

translation.from: You must complete the image verification to prove that you are a human.
translation.to: You must complete the image verification to prove that you are a human.

translation.from: You must include a security question and answer so that you can retrieve your password should you lose it.
translation.to: You must include a security question and answer so that you can retrieve your password should you lose it.

translation.from: You must provide a valid confirmation code to authorize your Astra Account. It should have been sent to your email address.
translation.to: You must provide a valid confirmation code to authorize your Astra Account. It should have been sent to your email address.

translation.from: You must provide a valid email address and password if you wish to link to your existing Trillian Pro account. Please type again.
translation.to: You must provide a valid email address and password if you wish to link to your existing Trillian Pro account. Please type again.

translation.from: Your email has been successfully changed.
translation.to: Your email has been successfully changed.

translation.from: Your email has been successfully updated.
translation.to: Your email has been successfully updated.

translation.from: Your membership information does not appear to be valid. Please type again.
translation.to: Your membership information does not appear to be valid. Please type again.

translation.from: Your membership information has been updated.
translation.to: Your membership information has been updated.

translation.from: Your membership information is bound to another Trillian Astra account. Please type again.
translation.to: Your membership information is bound to another Trillian Astra account. Please type again.

translation.from: Your password has been successfully changed.
translation.to: Your password has been successfully changed.

translation.from: Your password must be from 6 to 32 characters in length.
translation.to: Your password must be from 6 to 32 characters in length.

translation.from: Your unique Trillian Astra Username must be between 6 and 64 characters long. Letters, numbers, and basic symbols are allowed, and your username must begin with a letter.
translation.to: Your unique Trillian Astra Username must be between 6 and 64 characters long. Letters, numbers, and basic symbols are allowed, and your username must begin with a letter.
プラグイン読み込み中...
Customize Trillian to fit your needs.
The Astra Profile Editor is not available in this skin.
No software updates are currently available.
Show last %num% lines of the previous conversation in the chat window
Trillian's Activity History system can record all your messages in an easy-to-use archiving format.
Trillian Pro provides a full history viewer directly in the client with searching! Click here to find out more!
An AstraContact allows you to expose all of your IM information in a single, neatly-packaged "AstraContact". AstraContacts support strict privacy controls and priority ordering.
Select sound sources and fine-tune quality settings here.
Delivers high quality sound. Uses as much available Internet bandwidth as possible.
Uses lowest amount of bandwidth required to maintain a proper sound.
Uses an average amount of bandwidth and attempts to keep sound quality as high as possible. Does not allow full throttle bandwidth usage.
Trillian's sophisticated Automation system allows it to respond to all kinds of events detected. Create Shortcut Keys, schedule an alarm, or match a word.
Automatically respond to messages with my away message
Attach new message windows to the Away Container window
Decide how Trillian behaves when you are away. You can also edit your Away Messages here.
Change to Idle status based on my mouse and keyboard usage
Set me back when I send an instant message
only if Trillian was set away automatically (idle, screensaver, ..)
Save the messages I type in the Contact List automatically
View or edit all your Personal and Away Messages here:

This display name may or may not be inherited by connection plugins. If you are having trouble changing your display name on a particular service, please be sure to check the options menu from within the service itself for a local method to change your display name.
You can type in your biography in paragraph form. The information will be shared in your Astra Profile as well as other networks, such as within AIM Profiles.
You can type in your biography in paragraph form. The information will be shared with the connections in this identity.
Manage other options for this account.
Fine tune the server and proxy settings for this connection.
This is your first time using Trillian on this computer. Please configure any connections you wish to automatically connect to from this location now.
Manage your connections to various networks. You can also fine-tune settings for individual connections.
Show Contact List always on top of other windows
Trillian is currently set to always on top for all windows.

Show background image in Contact List:
The Trillian Contact List is where all your lists of friends and information reside in. You can customize the behavior of the List, and make it easily accessible here.

Trillian Astra can be used with an interconnected array of devices. View the status and disconnect devices in the list below.
Trillian Pro provides the ability to log into Trillian Astra from many computers and manage those connections here! Click here to find out more!
Emotiblips are instant short video or audio clips that you can insert into your conversation. Use your imagination! Surprise your friends!

Send and receive files from your contacts. Choose default download folder and enable virus scanning.

Allows you to travel back in recorded time and playback instantly to see what has happened. Unfortunately, time travel to the future is not currently available.
Provides the largest capacity of playback. Optimal for high speed hard drives
Enables quickest retrieval of video playback. Use this option if you are not running other large applications, or if your hard drive is not fast enough
Turn off Instant Playback if your computer becomes sluggish
Select camera and microphone sources and fine-tune quality settings here.
Trillian Pro provides more functionality in video chat, such as full screen and fun effects! Click here to find out more!
Uses as much available bandwidth as possible, resulting in the sharpest pictures and highest quality audio.
Uses lowest amount of bandwidth required to maintain viewable video images and decent quality audio.
Uses an average amount of bandwidth and attempts to keep video and audio quality as high as possible. Does not allow full throttle bandwidth usage.
Settings only available while a video chat is active.
Unable to read from or write to the configuration directory for this account.
The username you entered is not valid. If you are a previous Trillian Pro user, you must register for a new Astra Account first and then bind these accounts together.
You may only log into this account once per machine. Please choose a different account or logoff in your other copy of Trillian.
Unable to find all components needed to run Trillian.

Trillian is currently running. The uninstall process may not properly remove all files. It is recommended that you do not continue and first shut down Trillian. Are you sure you wish to continue anyway?
We have found some personal files located within the configuration directory and will launch explorer so that you may finish the cleaning.
This is not a valid Trillian Plugin.
This plugin is only allowed in Trillian Pro.
A skin must be selected in order to run Trillian.
This does not appear to be a valid skin, please pick another or quit.
No Trillian 0.70+ compliant skins found, exiting.
This skin will not work with this version of Trillian. Please choose another.
You must properly select an appropriate interface/sound/emoticon pack. No stixe changes will be made.
Thank you for using Trillian, we hope you try our product again soon.
Trillian requires at least WinSock 2.0. Please upgrade your version of WinSock before continuing! Thanks. To upgrade WinSock: Consult the Trillian ReadMe File.
Are you certain you want to remove this account?

You must be at least 13 years old to use Trillian. If you entered your age incorrectly, please choose 'yes' to re-enter it. Otherwise, choose 'no' and trillian will shut down. Did you enter your age incorrectly?

Would you like to change %account%'s identity from "%from_section%" to "%to_section%"?

This action will disconnect your connection to %account% on %medium%. Contacts imported into the "%to_section%" identity may not have the same group layout as they did in "%from_section%". Any other resources connected to your Astra account will be disconnected.
Contacts imported into the "%to_section%" identity may not have the same group layout as they did in "%from_section%". Any other resources connected to your Astra account will be disconnected.
Are you sure you wish to remove this identity?
The stored settings for this account are no longer accessible. Move them?

Newer versions of Windows utilize User Account Control (UAC), which prohibits applications from writing to certain portions of your hard drive. Your previous configuration directory can no longer be safely updated while UAC is enabled. Trillian would like to move your stored settings to an area that will allow it to continue normal operation.
Trillian Astra must be loaded and connected to use this feature.
Uninstalling this plugin will remove the configuration and plugin from your computer. Are you sure you want to uninstall this plugin?
Some settings changed will not update until you reload Trillian. Do you wish to reload now?
Would you like to remove the section associated with this identity as well? (This will remove all of the contacts within that section)
